item.title: Kubernetes API powered resource discovery (feat. K8s C# client)
item.description: Have you ever felt the need to automate the discovery of some information within a distributed system? Turns out, the Kubernetes API makes it surprisingly simple to do so.

item.title: Run AI Offline in C#.NET
item.description:
In this video, I‚Äôll walk you through how to run powerful AI models completely offline using llama-cli ‚Äî and how to interface it with a C# application! üöÄ
We'll cover:
0/ Installing and setting up llama-cli 1/ Downloading and using GGUF models 2/ Running text generation locally without an internet connection 3/ Building a simple C# integration to send prompts and receive AI responses 4/ Why learning to run AI offline is critical ‚Äî for privacy, cost control, performance, and future-proofing your projects 5/ Best practices for using offline AI in your own apps
Whether you're building secure apps, working with sensitive data, or just want full control over your AI models, this guide will help you get started!
üîó Useful links and code samples are in the description below: Download Llama CLI and Dlls from here: https://github.com/ggml-org/llama.cpp/releases
Download TinyLlama Model (GGUF file): https://huggingface.co/TheBloke/TinyLlama-1.1B-Chat-v1.0-GGUF/tree/main
Source code for C# interface with Llama-cli https://github.com/hassanhabib/POC.AI.Llama.Offline
If you enjoy this kind of content, like üëç, subscribe üîî, and drop a comment if you have any questions or ideas for future videos!
#AI #CSharp #LlamaCpp #OfflineAI #OpenSource #Programming
item.author: (Hassan Habib)

item.title: ARK000: Introduction to ARK (Acts of Random Kindness Project)
item.description:
Welcome to ARK000 ‚Äî the kickoff for ARK (Acts of Random Kindness) üåü This is an open source, nonprofit project to build a mobile app that encourages people to do something kind every single day ‚Äî and share their stories, photos, or videos with the world. No ads. No catch. Just good people doing good things.
In this stream: 0/ What is ARK? 1/ Why kindness needs its own platform 2/ How we're building it (Blazor MAUI üöÄ) 3/ How you can get involved (code, design, ideas, support)
It‚Äôs free ‚Äî as in free tea and free speech. üçµüó£Ô∏è If you‚Äôre looking for something positive to build, you‚Äôre in the right place.
Let‚Äôs make something beautiful together.
item.author: (Hassan Habib)
